overview:
Muki founded pepper square with 11 dollars in his pocket. A peopleÂ´s person, Muki leverages 18 years of experience in the field of branding, experience design, emerging media, integrated marketing and technology development. Muki has influenced over 150 companies from brand building to exit strategy in his career.

MukiÂ´s digital strategy for one of IndiaÂ´s large IT companies has helped them garner $230 million worth of leads through their online initiatives.

A combination of high energy and extreme passion, his skills to connect and mentoring abilities, have seen 12 entrepreneurs born from pepper square. Muki is a Charter Member of the prestigious TIE (The Indus Entrepreneurs, the largest and the oldest entrepreneurial association in the world). He regularly devotes his time to enhancing the entrepreneurial ecosystem through TIE and other non-profit organizations.

Muki travels across India to share his experience and mentor students on Entrepreneurship.

For Muki, it is all about finding the right balance; pottery and painting for inspiration; bungee jumping and snowboarding for extreme adventure.
